beans.name: Yirgacheffe Chelchele
beans.notes: Floral and bergamot, tea-like body with lemon zest.

beans.name: AA Nyeri Ichamara
beans.notes: Blackberry jam, black tea, crisp finish.

beans.name: Tarrazú Honey
beans.notes: Honey sweetness, stone fruit, clean finish.

beans.name: Funky monkey
beans.notes: muddy, earthy, heavy and notes of soil

brews.tastingNotes: Bergamot and lemon candy; syrupy, sweet finish.
brews.improvementNotes: Slightly finer grind could boost intensity.

brews.tastingNotes: Delicate florals, clean citrus, tea-like body.
brews.improvementNotes: Pre-wet filter more thoroughly; extend bloom by 10s.

brews.tastingNotes: Silky milk with jasmine and citrus peeking through.
brews.improvementNotes: Aim for 55–60°C milk; slightly tighter 1:2 shot.

brews.tastingNotes: Caramel and baked apple, balanced acidity.
brews.improvementNotes: Try 1:2.2 ratio for more sweetness and clarity.

brews.tastingNotes: Rounded caramel, gentle apple acidity; creamy mouthfeel.
brews.improvementNotes: Stir once at 4:00 and skim fines for clarity.

brews.tastingNotes: Punchy blackberry, black tea tannins, lingering sweetness.
brews.improvementNotes: Lower temp to 93°C if tannins creep in.

brews.tastingNotes: Juicy red berries with black tea finish.
brews.improvementNotes: Pulse pours to reduce channeling; keep bed flat.

brews.tastingNotes: Milk chocolate and orange, smooth and sweet.
brews.improvementNotes: Add 30s steep before press to deepen sweetness.

brews.tastingNotes: Strawberry jam and cream, very lush.
brews.improvementNotes: Keep shot time under 30s to preserve fruit.

brews.tastingNotes: Blueberry soda vibes; very low acidity.
brews.improvementNotes: Try 18h for stronger concentrate; dilute 1:1.

brews.tastingNotes: Nutty cocoa; a touch bitter.
brews.improvementNotes: Lower heat and pull early to avoid harshness.

brews.tastingNotes: Chocolate and hazelnut, very comforting.
brews.improvementNotes: Keep milk texture thin for better integration.

brews.tastingNotes: Honeyed sweetness with stone fruit and a clean finish.
brews.improvementNotes: Bloom 40g for 45s; gentle spiral pours.

brews.tastingNotes: Sweet nectarine, medium body.
brews.improvementNotes: Inverted, 60s steep, quick 20s press improves clarity.

brews.tastingNotes: Red currant and cocoa; plush mouthfeel.
brews.improvementNotes: Break crust at 4:00 and let fines settle 1 minute.

brews.tastingNotes: Bright acidity; slightly thin.
brews.improvementNotes: Coarsen grind one notch and target 1:2.1.

brews.tastingNotes: Jasmine, peach and bergamot; sparkling clarity.
brews.improvementNotes: Rinse filter thoroughly; maintain steady pour rate.

brews.tastingNotes: Concentrated florals and peach nectar.
brews.improvementNotes: Slightly tighter ratio preserves aromatics.

brews.tastingNotes: Toffee and plum; pleasantly rich.
brews.improvementNotes: Use preheated water to shorten contact time.

brews.tastingNotes: Balanced cup with toffee sweetness and gentle plum.
brews.improvementNotes: Try Rao spin at the end for an even bed.

brews.tastingNotes: Orange oil and milk chocolate; smooth.
brews.improvementNotes: Slightly faster shot accentuates citrus.

brews.tastingNotes: Caramel latte texture with apple brightness.
brews.improvementNotes: Keep microfoam glossy; avoid stretching past 40°C.

brews.tastingNotes: Strawberry cream soda; super silky.
brews.improvementNotes: Paper + metal filter combo improved body nicely.

brews.tastingNotes: Cocoa-heavy with muted acidity.
brews.improvementNotes: Drop dose to 18g and coarsen slightly for balance.

brews.tastingNotes: Honey sweetness stands out; very smooth.
brews.improvementNotes: Shorten steep to 12h if too heavy; consider paper filter.

brews.tastingNotes: Tangy currant with cocoa; slightly harsh finish.
brews.improvementNotes: Remove from heat at first sputter and cool base.

brews.tastingNotes: Perfumed florals through sweet milk; elegant.
brews.improvementNotes: Thin microfoam preserves delicate aromatics.

brews.tastingNotes: Berry sweetness with tea-like structure; plush.
brews.improvementNotes: Longer steep by 20s boosted body without bitterness.

brews.tastingNotes: Citrus peel over chocolate; lively cup.
brews.improvementNotes: Use cooler water in boiler to slow extraction.

brews.tastingNotes: Caramelized sweetness with red apple snap; very clean.
brews.improvementNotes: Rinse filter longer; maintain 6–7g/s pour rate for even bed.

brews.tastingNotes: Berry sweetness with tea-like structure; plush.
brews.improvementNotes: Longer steep by 20s boosted body without bitterness. Longer steep by 20s boosted body without bitterness.Longer steep by 20s boosted body without bitterness.Longer steep by 20s boosted body without bitterness.

brews.tastingNotes: It was divine. I honestly can't believe how good it tasted. Like straight mud in the teeth. I could feel my chesthair growing and moustache furrowing it was so bonkers on the pallette. Now lets see if this text is long enough to be cut off at any point
brews.improvementNotes: nothing. perfection
